# about me

hello, i'm phoebe thatcher. i am a data analyst and naturalist committed to bringing people closer to science and science closer to people. i'm passionate about bringing data to life through gorgeous visualizations and concise, accessible analysis and reporting. my current interests include building interactive dashboards with the {shiny} framework for R, and applying machine learning concepts to ecological data.
